definition: head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc
summit talks/discussion between heads of state

sentences.english: The main topic of the meeting was expected to be the political crisis in Zimbabwe.
sentences.chinese: 预计，这次首脑会议的主题是津巴布韦的政治危机。

sentences.english: Parts of the country are still dominated by warlords.
sentences.chinese: 该国仍部分由军阀式首脑统治着。

sentences.english: Krishnamurti was made Head of the Order.
sentences.chinese: 克里希那穆提成为了明星社的首脑。

sentences.english: Brundtland was head of government for more than 10 years.
sentences.chinese: 前后10多年的时间里，布伦特兰一直担任政府首脑。

sentences.english: The four-nation summit meeting on the election in the land base.
sentences.chinese: 此次四国首脑的会议之地就选在这个基地。

sentences.english: We dined with royalty, heads of states, authors, and activists.
sentences.chinese: 我们和皇室，政府首脑，作家，社会活动家一起吃饭。

sentences.english: The head of the International Confederation of Wizards is called the Supreme Mugwump .
sentences.chinese: 巫师国际联邦的首脑被称为最高会长。

sentences.english: The confederacy had no official head or chief executive officer .
sentences.chinese: 联盟没有一长制首长，即没有主掌执行权的首脑。

sentences.english: These soldiers were lead by the officials from chief priests and scribes of the Sanhedrin .
sentences.chinese: 这些兵丁们是由大祭司和议会中的一些首脑们带领的。

sentences.english: In Nixon's tenure, the United States held three Soviet summit.
sentences.chinese: 在尼克松任期内，美苏共举行了三次首脑会晤。

sentences.english: Chinese Premier Li Peng attended the first Asia-Europe summit.
sentences.chinese: 李鹏总理出席了首届亚欧首脑会议。

sentences.english: Mickeys the former leader of the team, and master of the long con.
sentences.chinese: 米奇是团队的前首脑，擅长长线诈骗。

sentences.english: The soundtrack of the first Runaway has stayed chugging round the heads of many players.
sentences.chinese: 原声带首走失留欧一轮首脑许多球员。

sentences.english: Each year, the Commission selects key development themes relating to the World Summit.
sentences.chinese: 每年，与世界首脑会议有关系的委托选择键发展主题。

sentences.english: Many problems call for an immediate solution before the five-state summit is held in our city.
sentences.chinese: 五国首脑会议在我市召开前有很多问题需要立刻解决。

sentences.english: It is chaired by the Prime Minister.
